import "../assets/scss/_skyz-demo.scss"; // import personImge from "../assets/imgs/person.jpg"; import { useState } from "react"; // import Table from "./Table"; import Kanban from "./Kanban"; const Demo = () => { const initialColumns = [ { id: "open", title: "Open" }, { id: "ongoing", title: "Ongoing" }, { id: "close", title: "Close" }, ]; const initialTasks = { open: [ { id: "task1", title: "Task 1", paragraph: "Description for Task 1" }, { id: "task2", title: "Task 2", paragraph: "Description for Task 2" }, { id: "task3", title: "Task 3", paragraph: "Description for Task 3" }, ], ongoing: [ { id: "task4", title: "Task 4", paragraph: "Description for Task 4" }, { id: "task5", title: "Task 5", paragraph: "Description for Task 5" }, ], close: [ { id: "task6", title: "Task 6", paragraph: "Description for Task 6" }, { id: "task7", title: "Task 7", paragraph: "Description for Task 7" }, ], }; const [columns, setColumns] = useState(initialColumns); const [tasks, setTasks] = useState(initialTasks); const onDragEnd = (result) => { const { source, destination, draggableId } = result; // Check if the drop is outside a valid destination if (!destination) return; // Check if the drop is in a different column if (source.droppableId !== destination.droppableId) { // Move the task to the new column const sourceTasks = tasks[source.droppableId]; const destinationTasks = tasks[destination.droppableId]; const task = sourceTasks.find((task) => task.id === draggableId); setTasks((prevTasks) => ({ ...prevTasks, [source.droppableId]: sourceTasks.filter((t) => t.id !== draggableId), [destination.droppableId]: [...destinationTasks, task], })); } else { // Reorder the tasks in the same column const columnTasks = tasks[source.droppableId]; const reorderedTasks = Array.from(columnTasks); reorderedTasks.splice(source.index, 1); reorderedTasks.splice( destination.index, 0, columnTasks.find((task) => task.id === draggableId) ); setTasks((prevTasks) => ({ ...prevTasks, [source.droppableId]: reorderedTasks, })); } }; // Create an array of booleans to manage the open state of each box const [boxOpenStates, setBoxOpenStates] = useState({ connections: false, communication: false, // Add more keys for other boxes here }); const [openBox, setOpenBox] = useState(null); // Track the currently open box const openBoxHandler = (boxKey) => { setOpenBox(boxKey); }; const [sidebarOpen, setSidebarOpen] = useState(false); const handleToggleSidebarDemo = () => { setSidebarOpen(!sidebarOpen); }; return (
{/*

); }; export default Demo;
